scripts.build: npm run build-user && npm run build-people && npm run build-worldmap
scripts.build-user: mkdir -p dist && browserify assets/user/index.js --standalone User | uglifyjs > dist/user.js
scripts.build-people: mkdir -p dist && browserify assets/people/index.js --standalone People | uglifyjs > dist/people.js
scripts.build-worldmap: mkdir -p dist && browserify assets/worldmap/index.js --standalone WorldMap | uglifyjs > dist/worldmap.js
